metadata.name: List
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List
metadata.description: Record::List is a special case Array with additional values.

metadata.name: token
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#token
metadata.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

metadata.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#token=
metadata.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

metadata.name: initialize
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#initialize
metadata.description: Create a new Record::List with an array of Record instances.

metadata.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#next?
metadata.description: Whether there a next page of records.

metadata.name: all
title: Gcloud
Dns
Record
List#all
metadata.description: Retrieves all records by repeatedly loading pages until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
records = zone.records.all # Load all pages of records
